original_title: ずっと憧れていた1個上のマドンナ先輩と部活の遠征で相部屋になった3日間。 橋本ありな
overview: A senior who I admired from the time I entered school. She joins the same literary club, but the number of members continues to decrease, and now it's just me and my senior. Next year, when the senior graduates, it was decided that the club would be abolished, but both of them will remain in the final selection of the spring national literary competition. It is informed that it becomes a shared room with a senior by mistake when going to the reserved hotel near the convention venue. "I don't care," my senior said, and began to gently lead me, who was nervous when I was alone in a closed room.
title: She Was One Grade Above Him, And He Always Admired This Madonna From Afar, But Now, On This Club Field Trip, They Were Sharing The Same Room, For The 3 Days Straight. Arina Hashimoto
